title: Ballmer: Saving Apple in 1997 was ‘craziest thing’ Microsoft ever did
text:
Ballmer: Saving Apple in 1997 was ‘craziest thing’ Microsoft ever did 
Published By: CultOfMac.com - Today 
Microsoft infamously invested $150 million in archenemy Apple in 1997 as the company was facing bankruptcy right after the return of Steve J...
